translations: adj．激怒的，恼火的：表示因受到挑衅、侮辱或不公平对待而感到愤怒的情绪。
· He was riled by the constant interruptions.
他被不断的打断搞得恼火。

sentences.sentence: He saw that I was riled.
I've never seen you so riled up.
sentences.translation: 我从来没看你这么愤怒过。

sentences.sentence: Yet this has riled Pakistan no end.
sentences.translation: 然而这也不断的激怒着巴基斯坦。
